TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RichTextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase

summary.span: 表示 Windows 多格式文本框控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows rich text box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控件，用户可以输入和编辑文本。With the control, the user can enter and edit text. 此控件还提供更高级格式设置功能比标准控件。The control also provides more advanced formatting features than the standard control. 文本可以直接分配给该控件，也可以是从丰富文本格式 (RTF) 或纯文本文件中加载。Text can be assigned directly to the control, or can be loaded from a rich text format (RTF) or plain text file. 字符和段落格式设置，可以分配在控件内的文本。The text within the control can be assigned character and paragraph formatting. 控件提供了多个属性可用来应用格式设置到控件中的文本的任何部分。The control provides a number of properties you can use to apply formatting to any portion of text within the control. 若要更改文本的格式设置，必须首先选择它。To change the formatting of text, it must first be selected. 字符和段落格式设置，可以分配仅所选的文本。Only selected text can be assigned character and paragraph formatting. 一旦具有对所选文本的一部分进行设置，选择所选内容也只使用相同的设置之前设置更改后输入的所有文本或控件的文档的其他部分。Once a setting has been made to a selected section of text, all text entered after the selection is also formatted with the same settings until a setting change is made or a different section of the control's document is selected. 属性使您可以使文本变为粗体或斜体。The property enables you to make text bold or italic. 此属性还可用于更改大小和字样的文本。You can also use this property to change the size and typeface of the text. 属性使您能够更改文本的颜色。The property enables you to change the color of the text. 若要创建项目符号列表，可以使用属性。To create bulleted lists you can use the property. 您还可以调整段落格式设置， ，和属性。You can also adjust paragraph formatting by setting the , , and properties. 控件提供了用于打开和保存文件提供功能的方法。The control provides methods that provide functionality for opening and saving files. 方法使你可以将现有 RTF 或 ASCII 文本文件加载到控件。The method enables you to load an existing RTF or ASCII text file into the control. 此外可以从已经打开的数据流中加载数据。You can also load data from an already opened data stream. 使您能够将文件保存到 RTF 或 ASCII 文本。The enables you to save a file to RTF or ASCII text. 类似于方法，您还可以使用方法将保存到开放式数据流。Similar to the method, you can also use the method to save to an open data stream. 控件还提供了功能，用于查找的文本字符串。The control also provides features for finding strings of text. 方法被重载以查找控件的文本中还为特定字符的文本的两个字符串。The method is overloaded to find both strings of text as well as specific characters within the text of the control. 此外可以初始化控件在内存中存储的数据。You can also initialize the control to data stored in memory. 例如，可以初始化属性设置为一个字符串，包含的文本显示，包括确定应如何格式化文本的 rtf 格式代码。For example, you can initialize the property to a string that contains the text to display, including the RTF codes that determine how the text should be formatted. 如果在控件内的文本中包含链接，例如链接到网站，则可以使用属性在控件的文本中相应地显示链接。If the text within the control contains links, such as a link to a Web site, you can use the property to display the link appropriately in the control's text. 然后，可以处理事件来执行与链接相关联的任务。You can then handle the event to perform the tasks associated with the link. 属性使您能够保护免受被用户操作的控件中的文本。The property enables you to protect text within the control from manipulation by the user. 通过在控件中受保护的文本，您可以处理事件以确定当用户尝试修改受保护的文本，并提醒用户的文本受保护或用户提供的标准方式来处理受保护的文本。With protected text in your control, you can handle the event to determine when the user has attempted to modify protected text, and either alert the user that the text is protected or provide the user with a standard way to manipulate the protected text. 已使用的应用程序控件可以轻松地进行修改才能利用使用控件。Applications that already use controls can easily be adapted to make use of controls. 但是，控件不具有相同的 64k 字符容量限制的控件。However, the control does not have the same 64K character capacity limit of the control. 通常用于提供文本操作和显示功能，类似于 Microsoft Word 等文字处理应用程序。The is typically used to provide text manipulation and display features similar to word processing applications such as Microsoft Word. > [!NOTE] > 方法并不适用于或事件。The method does not work with the or events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建将 RTF 文件加载到控件并搜索"Text。 该单词的第一个实例的控件The following code example creates a control that loads an RTF file into the control and searches for the first instance of the word "Text." 然后，该代码更改字体样式、 字体大小和所选文本的字体颜色，并将所做的更改保存回原始文件。The code then changes the font style, font size, and font color of the selected text and saves the changes back to the original file. 示例代码可以通过添加到控件来完成其。The example code finishes by adding the control to its . 此示例需要在示例代码中创建的方法添加到类，并从窗体的构造函数调用。This example requires that the method created in the example code is added to a class and called from the constructor of the form. 该示例还需要创建一个 RTF 文件，根目录中的 C 驱动器，其中包含单词"Text。The example also requires that an RTF file is created, in the root of the C drive, containing the word "Text." remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为`true`，选择控件中的任何一部分文本选择整个单词。If this property is set to `true`, selecting any part of the text in the control selects the entire word. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的放大文本，会自动选择该控件的文本中单词，某个词在双击之后，并且具有控件的客户端区域右侧的边距时。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果控件具有较小的宽度，使用此代码将创建其中每个字符的文本显示在其对应行。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在垂直显示此位置上，单击某个词的任何部分将选择的文本垂直显示无论词的所有字符。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 此示例要求有一个包含窗体名为控件`richTextBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将项目符号样式应用于文本的段落，设置属性设置为`true`，然后设置属性设置为应缩进文本的像素数。To apply the bullet style to a paragraph of text, set the property to `true` and then set the property to the number of pixels that the text should be indented. 将段落将具有项目符号样式应用于其与指定的项目符号后的缩进量。The paragraph will have the bullet style applied to it with the specified amount of indentation after the bullet. 此属性才影响控件的文本和当前所选项目符号列表中的项目符号项中将当前段落。This property only affects the current paragraph within the control's text and the currently selected bullet in a list of bulleted items. 若要将不同的缩进级别应用于整个项目符号项的列表，项目符号项的所有文本之前，必须都选择设置属性。To apply a different indentation level to an entire list of bulleted items, all the text of the bulleted items must be selected before setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有属性， ， ，并属性，以创建项目符号列表中的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the , , , and properties to create a bulleted list in a control. 此示例需要名为控件`richTextBox1`窗体上创建。This example requires that a control named `richTextBox1` is created on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法以确定是否将剪贴板中的当前内容中指定的剪贴板数据格式在启用用户后，将其粘贴到的信息之前控件。You can use this method to determine whether the current contents of the Clipboard are in a specified Clipboard data format before enabling the user to paste the information into the control. 例如，可以创建的事件处理程序粘贴命令事件并使用此方法来确定是否粘贴基于剪贴板中的数据类型，应启用。For example, you could create an event handler for a event of a paste command and use this method to determine whether the paste should be enabled based on the type of data in the Clipboard. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来将粘贴到位图控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to paste a bitmap into the control. 从文件打开一个位图之后, 该示例使用方法以将位图复制到 Windows 剪贴板。After opening a bitmap from file, the example uses the method to copy the bitmap to the Windows clipboard. 最后，该示例将检索的格式对象，使用方法以验证格式可以粘贴到控件，然后使用方法将数据粘贴。Finally, the example retrieves the format for the object, uses the method to verify that the format can be pasted into the control, and then uses the method to paste the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的方法搜索字符中指定的列表中的字符的第一个实例`characterSet`参数和返回的字符的位置。This version of the method searches for the first instance of a character from a list of characters specified in the `characterSet` parameter and returns the location of the character. 例如，您传递一个包含字符 Q 的字符数组。For example, you pass an array of characters containing the character 'Q'. 如果控件包含文本"快速 Brown Fox"，方法将返回四个值。If the control contained the text "The Quick Brown Fox", the method would return the value of four. 大写字符和小写字符被视为不同的搜索中的值。An upper case character and a lower case character are considered different values in the search. 如果该属性返回一个负值，控件的内容中未找到要搜索的字符。If the property returns a negative value, the characters being searched for were not found within the contents of the control. 此方法可用于搜索的一组控件内的字符。You can use this method to search for a group of characters within the control. 此版本的方法需要的字符将搜索控件中包含整个文档。This version of the method requires that the entire document contained in the control is searched for the characters. 如果提供的方法中的字符列表中的字符`characterSet`找到参数，则此方法返回的值为控件中的字符位置的从零开始索引。If a character from the character list provided in the method's `characterSet` parameter is found, the value returned by this method is a zero-based index of the character's position in the control. 确定一个字符的位置时，空间是由方法算作一个字符。A space is considered a character by the method when determining the location of a character. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将搜索的内容传递到方法中的字符为`text`参数。The following code example searches the contents of a for the characters that are passed to the method in the `text` parameter. 如果的内容`text`数组中找到，该方法返回; 否则为值的索引，则返回-1。If the contents of the `text` array are found in the , the method returns the index of the value that is found; otherwise, it returns -1. 该示例需要此方法放置的类中，其中包含控件命名为`richTextBox1`和一个控件，名为`button1`，即连接到`Click`中定义的事件处理程序该示例。The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a that contains a control named `richTextBox1` and a control, named `button1`, that is connected to the `Click` event handler defined in the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中指定的文本搜索`str`参数，并返回第一个字符的搜索位置在控件内的字符串。The method searches for the text specified in the `str` parameter and returns the location of the first character of the search string within the control. 如果该属性返回一个负值，该控件的内容中未找到要搜索的文本字符串。If the property returns a negative value, the text string being searched for was not found within the contents of the control. 此方法可用于创建可以提供给控件的用户的搜索功能。You can use this method to create search functionality that can be provided to the user of the control. 此方法还可用于搜索的文本替换为特定的格式。You can also use this method to search for text to be replaced with a specific format. 例如，如果用户输入日期到控件，您可以使用方法来搜索文档中的所有日期，并将其替换相应的格式为使用之前控件的方法。For example, if the user entered dates into the control, you could use the method to search for all dates in the document and replace them with the appropriate format before using the method of the control. 与此版本的方法，可以指定选项，可使您能扩大或缩小搜索范围。With this version of the method, you can specify options that enable you to expand or narrow your search. 可以指定选项，使您的搜索词大小写匹配或整个单词而不是部分单词搜索。You can specify options that enable you to match the casing of the search word or to search for entire words instead of partial words. 通过指定`RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse`中的枚举`options`参数，您可以搜索从文档底部到顶部而不是默认顶部到底部搜索方法的文本。By specifying the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` enumeration in the `options` parameter, you can search for text from the bottom of the document to the top instead of the default top to bottom search method. 此版本的方法还可以缩小搜索范围的文本选择的控件文本内的特定起始位置。This version of the method also enables you to narrow the search for text by selecting a specific starting position within the control's text. 此功能可以使你可以避免的文本，可能已经搜索完或要搜索的特定文本知道不存在。This feature can enable you to avoid text that might have already been searched or where the specific text you are searching for is known not to exist. 当`RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse`中指定值`options`参数、 的值`start`参数指示由于时使用此版本的搜索将从文档底部开始反向搜索结束的位置的位置方法。When the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` value is specified in the `options` parameter, the value of the `start` parameter indicates the position where the reverse search will end since the search will start at the bottom of the document when using this version of the method. > [!NOTE] > 方法接受`string`参数不能发现包含多个行内文本的文本。The methods that accept a `string` as a parameter cannot find text that is contained on more than one line of text within the . 执行此类搜索将返回值为负一 (-1)。Performing such a search will return a value of negative one (-1). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将搜索的全部内容搜索字符串的第一个实例传递到文本参数的方法。The following code example searches the entire contents of a for the first instance of a search string passed into the text parameter of the method. 由该方法的 start 参数指定搜索起始位置。The search starting location is specified by the start parameter of the method. 如果搜索字符串中找到，该方法返回的文本的第一个字符的索引位置，并突出显示所找到的文本; 否则，返回值为-1。If the search string is found in the , the method returns the index location of the first character of the found text and highlights the found text; otherwise, it returns a value of -1. 该示例还指定要匹配指定的搜索字符串的大小写的搜索中的选项。The example also specifies options in the search to match the case of the specified search string. 该示例需要此方法放置的类中，其中包含名为`richTextBox1`。The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a that contains a named `richTextBox1`. 此示例可用于执行"查找下一个"类型的操作。You can use this example to perform a "Find Next" type of operation. 一旦找到搜索文本的实例，可以通过更改的值来查找文本的其他实例`start`参数来搜索当前匹配项的位置之外的某个位置。Once an instance of the search text has been found, you can find other instances of the text by changing the value of the `start` parameter to search at a location beyond the position of the current match. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回与指定的位置最接近的字符索引`pt`参数。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字符索引是文本的在控件中，包括空格的从零开始索引。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 此方法可用于确定在文本中用户在其上将鼠标放到此方法传递鼠标坐标。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 这很有用，如果你想要在用户将鼠标指针停留在控件文本中的单词时执行任务。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法替换方法内的特定字符串搜索控件并显示找到的字符串所在的位置中的字符索引控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method with the method to search for a specific string within a control and display the character index where the found string is located within the control. 该示例搜索"brown"控件的内容中的单词，并返回在其中找到的搜索字符串的字符索引位置。The example searches for the word "brown" within the contents of the control and returns the character index position where the search string is found. 此示例要求有一个包含窗体名为控件`richTextBox1`，包含文本。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1` that contains text. 它还需要在示例中的代码连接到事件的。It also requires that the code in the example is connected to the event of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确定基于中指定的字符索引的行号`index`方法的参数。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控件中的文本的第一行返回值为零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法返回的物理行号的索引的字符所在的位置在控件内。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果文本中的第一个逻辑行的一部分控件换行到下一行方法返回 1，如果指定的字符索引处的字符具有换行到第二个物理行。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果设置为`false`、 行的任何部分被换到下一步，并且该方法返回对指定的字符索引为 0。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 此方法可用于确定哪一行是位于特定的字符索引。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在调用方法可搜索的文本，可以获取到找到搜索结果的位置的字符的索引。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 您可以调用此方法返回的字符索引与找不到方法来确定单词的哪一行。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. 在某些情况下，不会引发异常时`index`参数是无效的值。In certain cases, does not throw an exception when the `index` parameter is an invalid value. 例如:For example: - 如果`index`参数是则为-1，返回 0。If the `index` parameter is or -1, returns 0. - 如果`index`参数是文本长度或，返回的最后一行文本，并不一定相同数作为`Lines.Length-1`，具体的值取决于属性。If the `index` parameter is the text length or , returns the number of the last line of text, which is not necessarily the same as `Lines.Length-1`, depending on the value of the property. 在这些情况下，验证之前，调用输入。In these cases, validate the input before calling . > [!NOTE] > 如果在中指定的字符索引`index`参数不在可用的控件内包含的行数，则返回最后一个行号。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在一个窗体，其中包含名为控件`RichTextBox1`，名为的按钮`Button1`和名为两个文本框`TextBox1`和`TextBox2`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control named `RichTextBox1`, a button named `Button1` and two text boxes named `TextBox1` and `TextBox2`. 当运行示例时，输入搜索字符串中的`TextBox2`单击该按钮以获取搜索结果。When the example is running, enter a search string in `TextBox2` and click the button to get search results. summary.span: 当用户在控件文本内的链接上单击时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks on a link within the text of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以创建此事件，以便处理已在控件内单击的链接的事件处理程序。You can create an event handler for this event to process a link that has been clicked within the control. 使用提供给事件处理程序的信息，您可以确定在文档中被单击的链接。Using the information provided to the event handler, you can determine which link was clicked in the document. > [!IMPORTANT] > 默认情况下，链接显示为文本并不是可单击。By default, links are displayed as text and are not clickable. 若要使其可单击集属性设置为`true`。To make them clickable set the property to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含的事件处理程序事件。The following code example contains an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序处理的文档中的链接单击控制，并启动默认浏览器的实例 (使用方法)，显示单击的链接的页面。The event handler processes link clicks within the document of a control and launches an instance of the default browser (using the method), displaying the page for the link that was clicked. 此示例需要事件处理程序已连接到事件。This example requires that the event handler has been connected to the event for a . summary.span: 将 RTF 格式文件或标准 ASCII 文本文件加载到 控件中。

span.span: Loads a rich text format (RTF) or standard ASCII text file into the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加载的文件时方法中，所加载的文件的内容替换的整个内容控件。When loading a file with the method, the contents of the file being loaded replace the entire contents of the control. 这将导致的值和属性以更改。This will cause the values of the and properties to change. 此方法可用于将以前创建的文本或 RTF 文档加载到操作的控件。You can use this method to load a previously created text or RTF document into the control for manipulation. 如果你想要保存该文件，则可以使用方法。If you want to save the file, you can use the method. > [!NOTE] > 与此版本的方法中，如果正在加载的文件不是 RTF 文档，将出现异常。With this version of the method, if the file being loaded is not an RTF document, an exception will occur. 若要加载不同类型的文件，如 ASCII 文本文件，请使用此方法接受的值的其他版本枚举用作参数。To load a different type of file such as an ASCII text file, use the other versions of this method that accept a value from the enumeration as a parameter. > [!NOTE] > 方法将不会打开一个文件，直到创建句柄。The method will not open a file until a handle is created for the . 确保在调用之前创建控件的句柄方法。Ensure that the control's handle is created before calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开到 RTF 文件控件。The following code example opens an RTF file into the control. 该示例使用类，以显示一个对话框以从用户请求该文件。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request the file from the user. 然后，此代码加载该文件假定它是 RTF 文档文件。The code then loads that file assuming that it is an RTF document file. 如果文件不是，示例代码将引发异常。If the file is not, the example code will throw an exception. 此示例需要将代码置于中类具有控件命名为`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. summary.span: 获取或设置用户可在多格式文本框控件中键入或粘贴的最大字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters the user can type or paste into the rich text box control.

value.span: 可以在文本框控件中输入的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters that can be entered into the control.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为 0 时，则可以在控件中输入的最大长度是文本的 64 KB 的字符。When this property is set to 0, the maximum length of the text that can be entered in the control is 64 KB of characters. 此属性通常是时使用用于显示单个丰富文本格式 (RTF) 文本行。This property is typically used when the is used to display a single line of rich text format (RTF) text. 若要将文本输入控件中的值，例如邮政编码和电话号码的长度限制或限制时，数据将在数据库中输入输入文本的长度，可以使用此属性。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database. 您可以限制到数据库中的相应字段的最大长度输入到控件的文本。You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. > [!NOTE] > 在代码中，可以设置的值属性的长度大于指定的值的值属性。In code, you can set the value of the property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the property. 此属性只影响在运行时输入到控件的文本。This property only affects text entered into the control at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定如果文本赋给控件大于分配给的值属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine if text being assigned to a control is larger than the value assigned to the property. 如果文本不是更大的该示例使用要分配给控件的文本属性。If the text is not larger, the example uses the property to assign the text to the control. 此示例需要控件，名为`richTextBox1`，已添加到窗体，该示例中的方法调用与提供给时，无法粘贴到该控件的参数的文本。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to a form and that the method in the example is called with text supplied to the parameter that is to be pasted into the control. 该示例还需要已设置属性的值来限制到的文本输入。The example also requires that the property has been set to a value to limit text entry into the . [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.MaxLength#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.MaxLength/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.MaxLength#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.MaxLength/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.MaxLength#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.MaxLength/VB/form1.vb#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Pastes the contents of the Clipboard in the specified Clipboard format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于将数据从剪贴板粘贴到该控件。You can use this method to paste data from the clipboard into the control. 此版本的方法是不同于作为它的方法使你可以粘贴指定剪贴板格式的纯文本。This version of the method is different from the method as it enables you to paste only text in a specified Clipboard format. 可以使用方法，以确定剪贴板中的数据是否为指定的剪贴板格式。You can use the method to determine whether the data within the Clipboard is in the specified Clipboard format. 然后，可以调用此版本的方法，以确保粘贴操作进行相应的数据格式。You can then call this version of the method to ensure that the paste operation is made with the appropriate data format. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来将粘贴到位图控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to paste a bitmap into the control. 从文件打开一个位图之后, 该示例使用方法以将位图复制到 Windows 剪贴板。After opening a bitmap from file, the example uses the method to copy the bitmap to the Windows clipboard. 最后，该示例将检索的格式对象，请验证是否可以将格式粘贴到控件，并使用方法将数据粘贴。Finally, the example retrieves the format for the object, verifies that the format can be pasted into the control, and uses the method to paste the data. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Protected As EventHandler

summary.span: 当用户尝试修改控件中受保护的文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user attempts to modify protected text in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定当用户尝试修改已被标记为受保护的控件中的文本时在应用程序中，可以创建此事件的事件处理程序。You can create an event handler for this event in your applications to determine when the user has attempted to modify text that has been marked as protected in the control. 可以使用事件处理程序，以通知受保护的文本用户正尝试修改的用户或显示一个对话框，使用户能够对文本进行适当更改。The event handler can be used to notify the user that the text the user is attempting to modify is protected or to display a dialog box that enables the user to make appropriate changes to the text. 例如，如果受保护的区域是日期，可以显示一个对话框，使用户能够选择的日期，然后可以应用于控件的文本。For example, if the protected area is a date, you can display a dialog box that enables the user to choose a date which can then be applied to the text of the control. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`RichTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RichTextBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 然后，可以使用方法以重新应用到控件的最后一个撤消操作。You can then use the method to reapply the last undo operation to the control. 方法使您能够确定用户已撤消的上一个操作是否可以重新应用到控件。The method enables you to determine whether the last operation the user has undone can be reapplied to the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用并属性，并方法，可以限制的重做操作，除非删除的文本的任何操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties, and the method, to restrict a redo operation to any action except the deletion of text. 此示例要求有一个包含窗体控制的和中的某个操作已执行和撤消之前调用在此示例中的代码。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control and that an operation within the has been performed and undone before the code in this example is called. summary.span: 获取或设置 控件内单个文本行的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of a single line of text within the control.

value.span: 控件中单个文本行的大小（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The size, in pixels, of a single line of text in the control.

value.span: 默认值为零。

span.span: The default is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大于零的值输入到控件，会将不可见的边距放置中的像素为单位从左侧和右侧的控件的指定数量的控件。When a value greater than zero is entered into the control, a nonvisible margin is placed in the control at the specified number of pixels from the left side of the control. 控件中的文本的下一行放置输入延伸到此边距之外任何文本。Any text that is entered that extends beyond this margin is placed on the next line of text in the control. 此属性会影响当前输入到控件，以及设置该属性后输入到控件的任何其他文本的所有文本。This property affects all text currently entered into the control as well as any additional text entered into the control after the property is set. 可以使用此属性来指定输入到的所有文本的最大线条宽度控件。You can use this property to specify a maximum line width for all text entered into a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的放大文本，会自动选择该控件的文本中单词，某个词在双击之后，并且具有控件的客户端区域右侧的边距时。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果控件具有较小的宽度，使用此代码将创建其中每个字符的文本显示在其对应行。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在垂直显示此位置上，单击某个词的任何部分将选择的文本垂直显示无论词的所有字符。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 此示例要求有一个包含窗体名为控件`richTextBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的文本，包括所有 RTF 格式代码。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the control, including all rich text format (RTF) codes.

value.span: RTF 格式的控件文本。

span.span: The text of the control in RTF format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以进行显示或带指定 RTF 格式定义的控件文本中提取的文本控件，可以使用此属性设置为将 RTF 格式化文本到控件。You can use this property to place RTF formatted text into the control for display or to extract the text of the control with the specified RTF formatting defined in the text of the control. 将另一个 RTF 源，如 Microsoft Word 或 Windows 写字板的 RTF 文本分配给该控件时，通常使用此属性。This property is typically used when you are assigning RTF text from another RTF source, such as Microsoft Word or Windows WordPad, to the control. 如果更改保留在运行时，仅对不带格式的原始文本的属性。If you change the property at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved. Rtf 格式代码，请参阅"丰富文本格式 (RTF) 规范，版本 1.6"MSDN library 中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For the RTF codes, see "rich text format (RTF) Specification, version 1.6" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

summary.span: 将 的内容保存到 RTF 格式文件。

span.span: Saves the contents of the to a rich text format (RTF) file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你可以将该控件的整个内容保存到 RTF 文件，可由其他程序如 Microsoft Word 和 Windows 写字板。The method enables you to save the entire contents of the control to an RTF file that can be used by other programs such as Microsoft Word and Windows WordPad. 如果文件的名称，将传递给`path`上指定的目录已存在参数，该文件将被覆盖恕不另行通知。If the file name that is passed to the `path` parameter already exists at the specified directory, the file will be overwritten without notice. 可以使用方法以加载到文件的内容。You can use the method to load the contents of a file into the . > [!NOTE] > 若要将控件的内容保存到不同类型的文件格式，如 ASCII 文本，使用此方法接受的值的其他版本枚举用作参数。To save the contents of the control to a different type of file format such as ASCII text, use the other versions of this method that accept a value from the enumeration as a parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例的内容保存到 RTF 文件的控件。The following code example saves the contents of a control to an RTF file. 该示例使用类，以显示一个对话框以请求来自用户、 路径和文件的文件名保存。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request from the user, the path and filename of the file to save. 然后，此代码将保存假定该内容位于丰富文本格式的文件。The code then saves the file assuming the content is in rich text format. 如果该文件已存在，则自动将其覆盖。If the file already exists, it is automatically overwritten. 此示例需要将代码置于中类具有控件命名为`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你可以将该控件的整个内容保存到 RTF 文件，可由其他程序如 Microsoft Word 和 Windows 写字板。The method enables you to save the entire contents of the control to an RTF file that can be used by other programs such as Microsoft Word and Windows WordPad. 如果文件的名称，将传递给`path`上指定的目录已存在参数，该文件将被覆盖恕不另行通知。If the file name that is passed to the `path` parameter already exists at the specified directory, the file will be overwritten without notice. 可以使用方法以加载到文件的内容。You can use the method to load the contents of a file into the . 此版本的方法可用于指定要保存到控件的内容的文件类型。This version of the method enables you to specify a file type to save the contents of the control to. 此功能可用于确保该文件保存在基于控件的内容的正确格式。You can use this feature to ensure that the file is saved in the proper format based on the contents of the control. 例如，如果文档不具有字体样式或颜色设置中的任何差异，将可以文件保存为 ASCII 文本文件，通过设置`fileType`参数`RichTextBoxStreamType.PlainText`。For example, if your document has no differences in font style or coloring, you can save the file as an ASCII text file by setting the `fileType` parameter to `RichTextBoxStreamType.PlainText`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例的内容保存到 ASCII 文本文件。The following code example saves the contents of the into an ASCII text file. 该示例使用类，以显示一个对话框以从用户请求的路径和文件名称。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request the path and file name from the user. 然后，代码将控件的内容保存到该文件。The code then saves the contents of the control to that file. 该示例使用此版本的方法，以指定该文件将另存为 ASCII 文本文件，而不是标准的丰富文本格式。The example uses this version of the method to specify that the file be saved as an ASCII text file instead of the standard rich text format. 此示例需要将代码置于中类具有控件命名为`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您可以提供给用户的水平和垂直滚动条控件以使外部物理尺寸为控件的控件中滚动文本。This property enables you to provide horizontal and vertical scroll bars to the user of the control to enable scrolling text within the control that is outside of the physical dimensions of the control. 此属性还可用于从控件以限制时滚动控件的内容中删除滚动条。You can also use this property to remove scroll bars from the control to restrict scrolling the contents of the control. > [!NOTE] > 水平滚动条将不会显示如果是`true`，而不考虑的值的属性。Horizontal scroll bars will not be shown if the is `true`, regardless of the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以获取所选的文本在控件中，包括 RTF 格式代码。This property enables you to obtain the selected text in the control, including the RTF formatting codes. 可以使用此属性将从您的控件复制文本，包括格式设置，并粘贴接受 RTF 其他应用程序中的文本格式的文本，例如 Microsoft Word 和 Windows 写字板。You can use this property to copy text from your control, complete with formatting, and paste the text in other applications that accept RTF formatted text, such as Microsoft Word and Windows WordPad. 若要获取所选的文本，而无需 RTF 格式代码，请使用属性。To get the selected text, without RTF formatting codes, use the property. 如果当前没有选定任何文本，此属性中指定的文本插入点处插入。If no text is currently selected, the text specified in this property is inserted at the insertion point. 如果选择文本，则分配给此属性的任何文本替换选定的文本。If text is selected, any text assigned to this property replaces the selected text.

summary.span: 获取或设置应用到当前选定内容或插入点的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment to apply to the current selection or insertion point.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件中不选择任何段落，则设置此属性适用于在其中插入点还会显示具有对齐属性设置段落后创建的段落对齐方式设置。If no paragraph is selected in the control, setting this property applies the alignment setting to the paragraph in which the insertion point appears as well as to paragraphs created after the paragraph that has the alignment property setting. 例如，如果有两个段落中的控制和插入点位于第二个段落。For example, if there are two paragraphs in a control and the insertion point is located within the second paragraph. 如果您设置属性设置为`HorizontalAlignment.Center`，将在控件中居中的插入点处的段落。If you set the property to `HorizontalAlignment.Center`, the paragraph at the insertion point will be centered within the control. 如果在第二个段落之后创建第三个段落，则它还与中心对齐的控件。If a third paragraph is created after the second paragraph, it also is aligned to the center of the control. 如果属性设置时，在控件中进行选择，则所有选定段落对齐根据此属性设置。If a selection is made within the control when the property is set, all paragraphs selected are aligned based on this property setting. 可以使用此属性中创建的文档中的段落对齐。You can use this property to align the paragraphs in a document being created in the . 例如，如果你想要居中的文档中的所有段落，您可以在控件中选择的所有段落和设置属性设置为`HorizontalAlignment.Center`。For example, if you want all paragraphs in a document to be centered, you can select all the paragraphs in the control and set the property to `HorizontalAlignment.Center`. > [!NOTE] > 返回`SelectionAlignment.Left`时文本选定内容中包含多个段落采用混合对齐方式。 returns `SelectionAlignment.Left` when the text selection contains multiple paragraphs with mixed alignment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将中的文本对齐。The following code example demonstrates how to align text within the . 此示例需要控件，名为`richTextBox1`，已添加到窗体。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.SelectionAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.SelectionAlignment/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.SelectionAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.SelectionAlignment/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.SelectionAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.SelectionAlignment/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，通过该值指示项目符号样式是否应用到当前选定内容或插入点。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bullet style is applied to the current selection or insertion point.

value.span: 如果当前选定内容或插入点应用了项目符号样式，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有选定任何文本，项目符号样式应用到当前插入点和用户输入的插入点之后的所有段落。If no text is selected, the bullet style is applied to the current insertion point and to all paragraphs that the user enters after the insertion point. 项目符号样式应用于控件的文本，直到移动插入点，或在用户按 Enter 键的空项目符号项上时。The bullet style is applied to the text of the control until the insertion point is moved or when the user presses the Enter key on an empty bullet item. 如果设置此属性时，已在控件中选定文本，将选定文本中的所有段落都转换为项目符号列表中的项目符号项中。If text is selected within the control when this property is set, all paragraphs within the selected text are converted into bulleted items in the bulleted list. 可以使用此属性来创建项目符号列表中创建的文档中控件。You can use this property to create bulleted lists within the documents you create in the control. 属性可用于指定要应用的项目符号和带项目符号项的文本之间的缩进量。The property enables you to specify the amount of indentation to apply between the bullet and the bulleted item's text. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有属性， ，和属性，以创建项目符号列表中的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the , , and properties to create a bulleted list in a control. 此示例需要名为控件`richTextBox1`窗体上创建。This example requires that a control named `richTextBox1` is created on a form. summary.span: 控件内的选定文本更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the selection of text within the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以创建此事件来确定用户何时更改选定文本在控件内的事件处理程序。You can create an event handler for this event to determine when the user has changed text selection within the control. 此事件的事件处理程序可以用于保留用户的应用程序内的任务完成之前选择的文本。An event handler for this event can be used to keep text selected until the user has completed a task within the application. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`RichTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RichTextBox1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置控件中的文本是显示在基线上、作为上标还是作为基线下方的下标。

span.span: Gets or sets whether text in the control appears on the baseline, as a superscript, or as a subscript below the baseline.

value.span: 指定字符偏移量的数字。

span.span: A number that specifies the character offset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值必须介于-2000年和 2000年之间。The value of this property must be between -2000 and 2000. 如果此属性设置为零，文本显示在基线。If this property is set to zero, the text appears on the baseline. 如果它是正数，数字指定进行提升到基线之上，选定文本所依据的像素数。If it is a positive number, the number specifies the number of pixels by which to raise the text selection above the baseline. 如果是负数，此数字会指定像素的数所依据的下标的文本选定内容中。If it is a negative number, this number specifies the number of pixels by which to subscript the text selection. 可以使用此属性指定为上标或下标的文本。You can use this property to specify text as superscript or subscript. 如果没有选定任何文本，偏移量被应用到当前插入点和用户类型的插入点之后的所有文本。If no text is selected, the offset is applied to the current insertion point and to all text that the user types after the insertion point. 适用的字符偏移量，直到属性更改为不同的值或插入点移动到控件中的其他部分为止。The character offset applies until the property is changed to a different value or until the insertion point is moved to a different section within the control. 如果在控件中选定文本，文本选择将具有对其应用此属性的值后，输入所选的文本和所有文本。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 此属性可用于创建此类应用程序的数学表达式作为上标和下标文本。You can use this property to create superscript and subscript text for such applications as mathematical expressions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定上标和下标文本内的使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to specify superscript and subscript text within the using the property. 此示例需要控件，名为`richTextBox1`，已添加到窗体。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前选定文本有多个指定的颜色，此属性返回`Color.Empty`。If the current text selection has more than one color specified, this property returns `Color.Empty`. 如果当前没有选定任何文本，此属性中指定的文本颜色应用到当前插入点和插入点之后键入到控件的所有文本。If no text is currently selected, the text color specified in this property is applied to the current insertion point and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 文本颜色设置应用属性更改为不同的颜色或插入点移动到控件中的其他部分之前。The text color setting applies until the property is changed to a different color or until the insertion point is moved to a different section within the control. 如果在控件中选定文本，文本选择将具有对其应用此属性的值后，输入所选的文本和所有文本。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 可以使用此属性以更改中的文本颜色。You can use this property to change the color of text in the . 若要使文本在控件中以粗体显示，请使用要分配的新字体有指定的粗体的字体样式属性。To make text bold in the control, use the property to assign a new font that has the bold font style specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示到用户指定的当前选定文本或当前插入后输入的文本颜色点控件。The following code example displays a to the user to specify a color for the current text selection or text entered after the current insertion point in a control. 此示例需要在示例中定义的方法添加到类，其中包含控件命名为`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the method defined in the example is added to a class that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前选定文本具有多个指定的字体，此属性是`null`。If the current text selection has more than one font specified, this property is `null`. 如果当前没有选定任何文本，此属性中指定的字体被应用到当前插入点和插入点之后键入到控件的所有文本。If no text is currently selected, the font specified in this property is applied to the current insertion point and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 字体设置属性更改为不同的字体或插入点移动到控件中的其他部分之前一直应用。The font setting applies until the property is changed to a different font or until the insertion point is moved to a different section within the control. 如果在控件中选定文本，文本选择将具有对其应用此属性的值后，输入所选的文本和所有文本。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 可以使用此属性以更改中的文本的字体样式。You can use this property to change the font style of text in the . 您可以将文本控件中的粗体、 斜体和下划线。You can make the text in the control bold, italic, and underlined. 此外可以更改文本和应用于文本的字体的大小。You can also change the size of the text and the font applied to the text. 若要更改控件中的文本的颜色，请使用属性。To change the color of the text in the control, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将更改当前设置的文本选择或输入中的插入点之后的文本的字体加粗样式控件。The following code example changes the current font bold style setting for the text selection or text entered after the insertion point within the control. 此示例需要的代码包含在方法内。This example requires that the code is contained within a method in a . 该示例还需要名为`richTextBox1`，已添加到。The example also requires that a , named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值可介于 1/64 (0.015625) 和 64.0，不包含之间。The value of this property can be between 1/64 (0.015625) and 64.0, not inclusive. 值为 1.0 指示不进行缩放应用于控件。A value of 1.0 indicates that no zoom is applied to the control. 该文档包含 TrueType 字体时，缩放功能的性能处于最佳状态。The zoom feature performs optimally when the document contains TrueType fonts. 当该控件，在文档中使用不是 TrueType 字体属性将使用最接近的整数值。When a font that is not TrueType is used within the document of the control, the property will use the nearest whole number value. 可以使用此属性启用的用户控件来放大太小，无法查看或压缩要启用多个要在屏幕上查看的文档的视图部分中的说明。You can use this property to enable the user of the control to zoom into sections of the documentation that are too small to view or to condense the view to enable more of the document to be viewed on screen. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的放大文本，会自动选择该控件的文本中单词，某个词在双击之后，并且具有控件的客户端区域右侧的边距时。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果控件具有较小的宽度，使用此代码将创建其中每个字符的文本显示在其对应行。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在垂直显示此位置上，单击某个词的任何部分将选择的文本垂直显示无论词的所有字符。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 此示例要求有一个包含窗体名为控件`richTextBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`.
